channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CEO Ryan Cohen says GameStop will focus on trading cards, not video games, as stock plummets 20%
item.description: Former video game stronghold is going all in on something entirely different.

item.title: 5 Takeaways From the Debate for N.Y.C. Mayor
item.description: The two front-runners in the New York City mayor’s race, Andrew M. Cuomo and Zohran Mamdani, traded barbs over their records, immigration and a host o...

item.title: Tombstone is introducing new pizzas with a ‘French Fry crust’
Critics urge the New York Stock Exchange to reject listing JBS, one of the world’s largest meat companies, claiming it’s illegally profiting from deforested land in Brazil
item.description: JBS expects its shares to begin trading Friday on the NYSE.

item.title: She helped build Disney’s theme park database. Now Sheila Jordan is leading a $38.5 billion Fortune 500 giant’s digital transformation efforts
item.description: Sheila Jordan is leading Fortune 500 company Honeywell’s digital transformation efforts.

item.title: In L.A., the Divide Between Peace and Violence Is in the Eye of the Beholder
item.description: Los Angeles, a city marked by fiery and full-throated protests, adds a new chapter to that history.

item.title: How the Passenger in Seat 11A Became the Only Survivor of the Air India Plane Crash
item.description: Viswash Kumar Ramesh was one of 242 people on the 787-8 Dreamliner that went down shortly after takeoff in Ahmedabad, India. Somehow, he walked away.

item.title: How Kennedy’s Purge of Advisers Could Disrupt U.S. Vaccinations
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., the health secretary, dismissed 17 scientific advisers to the C.D.C. Critics fear newly appointed members will roll back vaccin...

item.title: ‘College doesn’t carry the same ROI it once did’: 70% of teens say their parents support them going to trade school or getting an apprenticeship
item.description: Parents are becoming more accepting of alternative post-high school plans.

item.title: They Asked ChatGPT Questions. The Answers Sent Them Spiraling.

item.title: What to Know About Israel’s Attack on Iran
item.description: Israel attacked Tehran early Friday and killed many of the country’s top military leaders and scientists. The United States said it was not involved i...

item.title: An extensive Israeli intelligence effort underpinned the Iran strikes.

item.title: How the Passenger in Seat 11A Became the Only Survivor of the Air India Plane Crash
item.description: Viswash Kumar Ramesh was one of 242 people on the 787-8 Dreamliner that went down shortly after takeoff in Ahmedabad, India. Somehow, he walked away.
